review1.text: "Prepwise was a game-changer for my GRE prep. The practice questions and progress tracking really helped me stay on top of my goals!"
review1.author: - John Doe

review2.text: "The detailed explanations for each question were amazing! I felt more confident walking into the exam thanks to Prepwise."
review2.author: - Jane Smith

review3.text: "I love the mobile app! I could study anytime, anywhere. Prepwise made it so easy to fit studying into my busy schedule."
review3.author: - Mark Wilson
